701265f-a.text:
Hoe Avenue, east side, between East 173rd and East 174th Streets, looking south and showing an empty lot, where apartment houses may later be put up. The rear of buildings, fronting on
Vyse Avenue, are shown in both views.
P. L. Sperr  July 31, 1928
No Reproductions  VViews 1,2
